metadata.title: CVE-2018-12183 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
Stack overflow in DxeCore for EDK II may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege, information disclosure and/or denial of service via local access.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-12183` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 0~20181115.85588389-2ubuntu1
ovmf-ia32 - 0~20181115.85588389-2ubuntu1
qemu-efi - 0~20181115.85588389-2ubuntu1
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 0~20181115.85588389-2ubuntu1
qemu-efi-arm - 0~20181115.85588389-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0~20181115.85588389-2ubuntu1').
